did.head: Collection Summary
did.unittitle: Papers relating to Emil L. Larsen, 1931-1962
did.abstract: Includes correspondence with university and college athletic directors, coaches, and faculty representatives, as well as officers and members of various other athletic conferences, of the National Association of Football Commissioners, and of the National Collegiate Athletic Assocation.

repository.label: Repository:
repository.corpname: University of Arizona Libraries, Special Collections

prefercite.head: Credit Line
prefercite.p: Papers relating to Emil L. Larsen's participation as Commissioner of the Border Intercollegiate Athletic Conference (Arizona, New Mexico, Texas) and as Secretary-Treasurer of the Border Conference Officials' Association(AZ 440). Special Collections, University of Arizona Libraries.

bioghist.head: Historical Note
bioghist.p: Professor of Education, University of Arizona.

arrangement.head: Organization
arrangement.p: This collection is organized into eleven series:

list.item: III. National Association of Football Commissioners/National Association of Collegiate Commissioners, 1945-1965
VI. University and College Coaches' Ratings of Officials, 1950-1961

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: Includes correspondence with university and college athletic directors, coaches, and faculty representatives, as well as officers and members of various other athletic conferences, of the National Association of Football Commissioners, and of the National Collegiate Athletic Assocation. Also minutes of meetings, financial records, ratings, examinations, rules handbooks, publications, photographs, and files (1965-1971) on the Arizona Football and Basketball Halls of Fame.
